#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	long long int a[n];
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)cin>>a[i];
	long long  dp[n];
	dp[1] = 0;
	for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
	{
		dp[i] = LLONG_MAX;
		for(int j=1;i-j>0;j=j*2)
		{
		
			//cout<<tst<<" "<<po<<endl;
			//cout<<" index"<<i<<" "<<j<<a[i-1]-a[j-1]+dp[j]<<endl;
			int h;
			h = a[i]-a[i-j];
//			cout<<dp[i-j]<<endl;		
			if(h<0)h=-1*h;
//			cout<<h<<endl;
				
			if(h+dp[i-j]<dp[i])
			{
			//	cout<<"index"<<i<<" "<<j<<endl;
				//cout<<a[i]<<" "<<a[j]<<endl;
				//cout<<h<<endl;
			//	cout<<h+dp[i-j]<<endl;
				dp[i] = h+dp[i-j];
			}
		}
	}
	//for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)cout<<dp[i]<<endl;

	cout<<dp[n]<<endl;
	return 0;
}
